channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: College Basketball Games of the Week: Kansas, Peterson Headline Stars in Action
item.description: Darryn Peterson, Bennett Stirtz, Lauren Betts and many more college basketball stars are battling this weekend. Here's how you can catch all of the ac...

item.title: Best Sports Betting Apps 2026: Top Betting Sites Reviewed
item.description: Compare the best sports betting apps and sites for 2026. See reviews, bonuses, and features to help choose the right sportsbook for your needs.

item.title: Aspiring Kaulig Truck Series Drivers to 'Race For The Seat' on FOX/FS1
item.description: "Race For The Seat" is an eight-episode series featuring 15 drivers getting behind the wheel of cars trying to earn a full-time ride.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From Miami's CFP Semifinal Win Over Ole Miss
item.description: Carson Beck and the Miami Hurricanes delivered when it mattered most, beating Ole Miss in an instant classic at the Fiesta Bowl on Thursday night.

item.title: What's Next: Which NFL Quarterbacks Might Be on the Move in 2026?
item.description: Despite a subpar 2026 quarterback draft class, a host of NFL QBs could be available this offseason, including some very big names.

item.title: WNBA CBA Q&A: Nneka Ogwumike, Napheesa Collier on 'standstill'
item.description: WNBPA president Nneka Ogwumike and VP Napheesa Collier applaud player solidarity but bemoan a lack of progress in CBA negotiations.

item.title: View items from Jim Irsay's iconic memorabilia collection
item.description: See photos of items from Jim Irsay's extraordinary memorabilia collection headed for auction in March, including Muhammad Ali's WBC championship belt ...

item.title: 'Not sure why they felt the need': NBA execs on the Trae deal and trade season's next move
item.description: Tim Bontemps and Brian Windhorst survey the league on the Trae Young deal and what comes next for the Washington Wizards and Atlanta Hawks.

item.title: 'I watched every guy': Curt Cignetti's secret to rosters and building Indiana into a CFP power
item.description: The Hoosiers' roster is filled with different kinds of players, but all had to meet Cignetti's standards.

item.title: CBA negotiations: Deadline looms, but extension is unlikely -- so what's next?
item.description: What does 'status quo' mean, and which issues are players focusing on hours ahead of the Jan. 9 deadline?
